name: BattleSquad
description:
BattleSquad 0.1a (Still working on this)

----- WARNING UNITY BUG MAY NOT WORK IN YOUR BROWSER -----

A Retro 8-Bit style Turn Based Strategy

WASD scroll map

Mouse Wheel To Zoom

LMB Select Trooper / Move To / Shoot At

MMB Drag To Pan Map (Only works in full screen mode)
